description: Try our easy to follow Espresso Granita recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Granita,Pescatarian,Low salt,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Espresso Granita Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Dissolve the sugar in 1 1/4 cups water in a small saucepan, stirring over medium heat until it boils. Increase the heat to high and boil, without stirring, for 5 minutes, to make a light syrup.
Pour the syrup into a shallow, freezer proof dish. Stir in the coffee and vanilla and let cool completely.

Transfer to the freezer. Every 30 minutes or so, use a fork to break up the frozen chunks. Continue to do this for about 4 hours or until the mixture has the texture of shaved ice. During the last 30 minutes or so, place the serving dishes for the granita in the freeze. Scoop the granita into the dishes and serve immediately.
